sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { GLOBALTYPES } from "../../redux/actions/globalTypes"; import { validRegister } from "../../utils/validRegister"; const Step1 = ({ transEmail }) => { const infoStep1 = { username: "", email: "", password: "", birthday: { day: "", month: "", year: "", }, }; const [info, setInfo] = useState(infoStep1); const { username, email, password } = info; const history = useHistory(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { alert } = useSelector((state) => state); const handleStep1 = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const check = validRegister.validStep1(info); if (check.errLength > 0) { dispatch({ type: GLOBALTYPES.ALERT, payload: check.errMsg }); } else { dispatch({ type: GLOBALTYPES.STEPONE, payload: info }); history.push("/submit/step2"); } }; useEffect(() => { setInfo((info) => ({ ...info, email: transEmail })); }, [transEmail]); return (
STEP 1 OF 3
Create a account to start your membership

Netflix is personalized for you. Create a account to watch on any device at any time.

setInfo({ ...info, username: e.target.value })} value={username} /> Username
{alert.username && {alert.username}}
Email or phone number
setInfo({ ...info, password: e.target.value })} value={password} /> Password
Birthday
{alert.birthday && ( {alert.birthday} )}
); }; export default Step1;
